verbose_text: It has been observed enhanced serum levels of this cytokine in patients, an increase in its expression in UC colonic tissues and interesting findings indicate an important role of CD4 + T intestinal lamina propria lymphocytes in the production of IL-21, especially after their activation by IL-12.
evidence: enhanced serum levels of this cytokine in patients              , an increase in its expression in UC colonic tissues               and interesting findings indicate an important role of CD4 +  T intestinal lamina propria lymphocytes in the production of IL-21
